leve.name: She's So Mean
leve.description: We need hardly recite the crimes of Lefquene the Mystic, whose power within the Lambs of Dalamud has grown with every act of mayhem perpetrated against all of Eorzea. Yet power draws envy and fear; someone close to Lefquene whispers to us of her presence in Nine Ivies. Beware the demons under her sway; plant the blade deep.
leve.client: The Order of the Twin Adder Red Otters
